content:
The soundtrack and score of Cyberpunk 2077 are indeed phenomenal! The game's soundtrack features a mix of electronic, rock, and hip-hop tracks from various artists, while the score is a haunting and atmospheric blend of synth-heavy music that perfectly captures the game's cyberpunk vibe.

As for accessing the soundtrack and score outside of the game, yes, there are a few ways to do so!

The official soundtrack for Cyberpunk 2077 is available on various music streaming platforms, including Spotify, Apple Music, and YouTube Music. You can search for "Cyberpunk 2077 Soundtrack" to find it.

As for the score, it's not officially available as a separate release, but you can find some of the score tracks on YouTube and other online platforms. Marcin Przybyłowicz, the game's composer, has also shared some of his work on his personal social media channels.

Additionally, CD Projekt RED has released a few soundtrack-related goodies, including a bonus EP featuring additional tracks from the game, and a behind-the-scenes video showcasing the creation of the soundtrack.

If you're interested in exploring more music from the game, I recommend checking out the official Cyberpunk 2077 channels on YouTube and social media, as they often share music-related content and behind-the-scenes insights into the game's soundtrack and score.

The music in Cyberpunk 2077 is truly exceptional, and it's great to see that the developers are passionate about sharing it with fans!
